website_summaries.verdict: A nice duo if you want a set of spacious, hardside luggage.
pros: Contemporary-looking luggage of rugged ABS and polycarbonate
Wheels are sturdy and move smoothly over most surfaces
cons: Though the exterior is sturdy, the finish is prone to scuffs

customer_reviews.title: It's not fake.
customer_reviews.text: Not a fake, I purchased the product on Friday for a great deal. The product came yesterday (Sunday) and it looks awesome! I'll update the review once I use it. I needed new luggage for my trip this December so I'm glad I was able to snag this deal. So far it looks pretty durable, but yeah I don't think it's of the HIGHEST Samsonite quality. The locks and zippers are a nice plus, and the small one looks roomy despite its size. Hopefully it can withstand being lugged around the trains in Japan.
customer_reviews.author: Amazon Customer

customer_reviews.title: Outlet price, outlet quality and all good!
customer_reviews.text: Great buy for the price! I read all the bad and scam reviews, but decided to give it a try. It is NOT a 1st line quality Samsonite and I knew it would not be. It is just like when you go shop at an outlet. Companies more and more create less expensive products (sometimes worse quality, of course, but not always) to sell to outlets, big sales and for this set all I have to say is that it looks as good for the price. The wheels are my major concern but with the 10 yr warranty from Samsonite, I am expecting it to last at least a good amount of trips. I'm happy with the product so far.
customer_reviews.author: Ana ALSA

customer_reviews.title: not so hard sided.......
customer_reviews.text: I was not impressed with this luggage. although it was light (as advertised), I was expecting a sturdy exterior that would protect my belongings, but this particular set was very flimsy to the point that we returned it knowing how luggage is treated by handlers. the appearance of the luggage was pleasant and I am certain that if it would only be handled personally then there is a good chance it would work okay. I did not receive any discounts or promotions for this review.
customer_reviews.author: rxdad

customer_reviews.title: Updated Review: Pretty Good after using it for a year.
customer_reviews.text: Update after using it for a year: I have been using them for more than a year now and I travel a lot. They have been great so far and I haven't faced any issues with them. I was initially concerned about the quality but now I can say for certain this was a great deal considering I now paid around 145 bucks after taxes during the black friday deal of 2016. Old Review: I was expecting it to of better quality. It's not glossy as it seems from the picture. I think samsonite made cheaper quality bags for amazon black friday.
customer_reviews.author: ArpanC

customer_reviews.title: Broke on first trip
customer_reviews.text: Bought this for my girlfriend for Christmas, and the attached photo is during our first trip a few weeks later. Both zippers have broken, and the suitcase is less than full. I'm not sure how we will even get her bag home in one piece. I suppose we will have to seran wrap. I assumed samsonite had better quality than this, but was mistake.
customer_reviews.author: El Andy

customer_reviews.title: It works good, looks good, but quality didn't exactly meet my expectations.
customer_reviews.text: This is probably a great product for the price... But on my first intercontinental flight I got a pretty big dent on the corner of the bigger suitcase... I was sort of able to fix it by pushing from the inside, but it left some white wrinkles. I would've hoped it was made of stronger material.
customer_reviews.author: Juninou

customer_reviews.title: Scuffa very easily.  Disappointed in quality
customer_reviews.text: Used once on short toad trip and the shell scuffed. Now has white and gray marks that look bad. We aren't rough with luggage, it just isn't durable. This isn't luggage you could ever fly with. The machines would tear it up.
customer_reviews.author: Beth S.

customer_reviews.title: LEGIT Samsonite product! Great quality!
customer_reviews.text: I was nervous to buy this after seeing all the reviews saying it is fake, I knew Amazon is trustworthy with returns if it wasn't, but this is legit Samsonite! Quality matches that of my other samsonite luggage. I am very pleased with the overall appearance and function of it. Definitely a great deal!
customer_reviews.author: robert junker

customer_reviews.title: Very nice luggage set.
customer_reviews.text: Got these at great price over a year ago. Roomy . Easy to maneuver. Stylish and can't beat the warranty. Some scratches but that's expected. Travel frequently and still going strong.
customer_reviews.author: Ro B.

customer_reviews.title: Real stuff. But lets see how durable.
customer_reviews.text: This is a legit product. Can't give 5 stars yet bc I just received them and spinners (i.e., 4 wheels) need to be able to withstand rough handing when checked in. So we'll see how the larger piece survives.
customer_reviews.author: A. Bansal

customer_reviews.title: ... I haven't used them yet but the design is nice. I like the double wheel design on them ...
customer_reviews.text: Honestly I haven't used them yet but the design is nice. I like the double wheel design on them and spins easily. I will update if any issues arise when I take them on my next trip. the finish was nice and overall nice product.
customer_reviews.author: Amaze

customer_reviews.title: Fantastic suitcases
customer_reviews.text: These suitcases are great! The wheels turn without hardly any effort. They've survived numerous aircraft loadings with only a few scratches. I really like the zippers also they are buttery smooth.
customer_reviews.author: AmazonUser

customer_reviews.title: So amazing
customer_reviews.text: I'm so glad I didn't see some of the bad reviews before I purchased these. I got these on black friday for a crazy good price and have been incredibly pleased! We've taken them on several trips and airlines and haven't noticed any issues. Wheels are great, the material is thick and sturdy, and the hardside is a great protective measure! The small one is perfect for carry ons. I seriously can't rave enough about these!
customer_reviews.author: Mary Kate M

customer_reviews.title: Quality Samsonite product
customer_reviews.text: Received this order in 2 days on Sunday after Black Fri.. Amazing and well made luggage with 8 wheels so it should last. Superb deal, basically 75% off the regular amazon price!
customer_reviews.author: gruve

customer_reviews.title: No scam!
customer_reviews.text: On Black Friday, I saw it and ordered immediately. A few hours later, I came back and I saw some reviews, I read them and was scared that this offer could be fake. But now I received them and I have to say that they're awesome!!! On top of that there's the 10 year warranty for them like for every original samsonite product.
customer_reviews.author: Amazon Customer

customer_reviews.title: Bought as a gift for my son. Both suitcases ...
customer_reviews.text: Bought as a gift for my son. Both suitcases are lightweight. He just received them so we don't know how well they will hold up.
customer_reviews.author: Robyn M.

customer_reviews.title: I love Samsonite but these are just a bit flimsy
customer_reviews.text: I love Samsonite but these are just a bit flimsy. I haven't taken them on a plane yet so we'll see how that goes..
customer_reviews.author: Susan Brehm Neigel

customer_reviews.title: PERFECTION
customer_reviews.text: Exactly as described!! I've used the smaller one for multiple overnight trips already and it is perfect!! Looking forward to having a week long trip where I will need to use the enormous one!!
customer_reviews.author: Stephan rocheford

customer_reviews.title: Good luggage, but they scratch very easily so don't ...
customer_reviews.text: Good luggage, but they scratch very easily so don't expect them to be in super great condition after your first flight. The luggage handlers at the airport aren't exactly careful.
customer_reviews.author: E. Moreno

customer_reviews.title: Travel in style!
customer_reviews.text: What a great deal that Samsonite had collaborated with Amazon to launch this pair of luggage. Does its job and looks slick too!
customer_reviews.author: Daniel G

customer_reviews.title: Like the new roll around
customer_reviews.text: Like the new roll around. As I am a older person arm strength is less. Makes it easier to be mobile and move around the airports
customer_reviews.author: mary bryan

customer_reviews.title: SO NOT A GOOD BUY BY ANY MEANS
customer_reviews.text: I USED THESE BAGS ONCE AND THE LARGE ONE, THE ZIP BROKE WHILE IN THE AIRPORT. ALL MY BELONGINGS EVERYWHERE. I WAS UNDERWEIGHT ALSO. THEY SAY THERE IS A TWO YEAR WARRANTY BUT I AM NOT GETTING ANYWHERE WITH GETTING A REPLACEMENT. SO NOT A GOOD BUY BY ANY MEANS.......
customer_reviews.author: Amazon Customer

customer_reviews.title: ... going on a lot of mission trips and he loved them!
customer_reviews.text: I bought these as a gift for my brother who is going on a lot of mission trips and he loved them!!
customer_reviews.author: Amy Simental

customer_reviews.title: Three Stars
customer_reviews.text: doubt the quality, there are so many hard scratch after I used ONCE
customer_reviews.author: AmazonPrimeReviewer

customer_reviews.title: Black Friday score
customer_reviews.text: Bought these on Black Friday. Very happy with my purchase.
customer_reviews.author: jackie

customer_reviews.title: They are excellent..
customer_reviews.text: I needed more suitcases. I was influenced by the negative reviews. And i bought only two. They are excellent...
customer_reviews.author: athina

customer_reviews.title: CAN'T GO WRONG WITH SAMSONITE
customer_reviews.text: Bought this as a cyber Monday deal, love it and and got this at a great price!
customer_reviews.author: Amazon Customer

customer_reviews.title: Samsonite bags lightweight for today's travel, work well
customer_reviews.text: These real Samsonite bags are a good buy and as advertised. Lightweight material but that's what's needed today.
customer_reviews.author: Amazon Customer

customer_reviews.title: Samsonite....it is what i expected
customer_reviews.text: Seems to be well made. Picked them up as a black friday deal. I will update after I fly with them.
customer_reviews.author: K Hancock

customer_reviews.title: Just So-So.
customer_reviews.text: I don't know if this spinner is legitimate, but since the merchant hired someone to explain, I'll buy it. I took me some time to unlock the TSA lock. The quality of the trunk is just acceptable - I can see threads though.
customer_reviews.author: Quinn P.

customer_reviews.title: Very good luggages
customer_reviews.text: Excelent quality luggages, I got it on Black friday so the deal was amazing and I love them
customer_reviews.author: Daniel B Chimelli

customer_reviews.title: Awesome luggage!
customer_reviews.text: Awesome, sturdy, name brand luggage. Any the price that I got it at while it was on sale...what a deal! You can never go wrong with Samsonite.
customer_reviews.author: Justin

customer_reviews.title: Five Stars
customer_reviews.text: LOVE THE QUALITY - WISH THERE WAS THE MIDDLE SIZE AVAILABLE TO PURCHASE
customer_reviews.author: Amazon Customer

customer_reviews.title: They are awesome and very well made
customer_reviews.text: Got these on Blackfriday despite the negative reviews. They are awesome and very well made! Naysayers lost out on a good buy. #TooBadSoSad
customer_reviews.author: Amazon Customer

customer_reviews.title: ... this was the best- the wheels make it so easy. I have problems with my knees and to ...
customer_reviews.text: I have many suitcases through the years this was the best- the wheels make it so easy. I have problems with my knees and to have suitcases with those kinds of wheels was wonderful
customer_reviews.author: Kathleen Dichiara

customer_reviews.title: Haven't used it yet but it looks sturdy and is
customer_reviews.text: Bought this as a gift. Haven't used it yet but it looks sturdy and is lightweight
customer_reviews.author: Lola

customer_reviews.title: I would be too happy to buy at an affordable price
customer_reviews.text: I would be too happy to buy at an affordable price. It looks sturdy and cool. It is also luxurious.
customer_reviews.author: DaGyo Jang

customer_reviews.title: Definitely did not feel sturdy enough to hold up after being tossed around by ...
customer_reviews.text: Definitely did not feel sturdy enough to hold up after being tossed around by TSA. The material was flimsy and felt cheap!
customer_reviews.author: Erin

customer_reviews.title: Real and fantastic value.
customer_reviews.text: This is a great purchase, i wish I bought more of them as gifts honestly. I'm looking and can't find anything close to the value i got on black friday! Great buy.
customer_reviews.author: tak

customer_reviews.title: Five Stars
customer_reviews.text: Great Looks and the quality also looks good, lets hope it does!
customer_reviews.author: ElGriegoMike

customer_reviews.title: Two Stars
customer_reviews.text: It was broken on the first day I flew with it.
customer_reviews.author: Avocado Power

customer_reviews.title: Good but no locker on smaller piece
customer_reviews.text: The color is beautiful, but the only thing which made me unhappy is absence of locker on small piece.
customer_reviews.author: Vera Lukina

customer_reviews.title: First flight the corner caved in and on my second ...
customer_reviews.text: First flight the corner caved in and on my second trip which was via car the zipper piece to close it and lock it broke off. This luggage is very thing and not hard case at all.
customer_reviews.author: ET

customer_reviews.title: Great set of luggage!
customer_reviews.text: It shipped fast and looks to be great quality. Excited to start using it.
customer_reviews.author: Amazon Customer

customer_reviews.title: They look really cool, however
customer_reviews.text: They look really cool, however, the zippers are in poor quality and it is hard to zip. Looking forward to the 10 warranty to repair them.
customer_reviews.author: Amazon Customer

customer_reviews.title: In love!
customer_reviews.text: I purchased this set on Black Friday and I am so glad I did. The color is gorgeous grey/gun metal look. It's pretty light weight and the wheels turn effortlessly. I didn't notice the fake reviews till after the purchase; but regardless it's a sturdy product, super sleek looking and definitely what I was looking for. Obviously the Samsonite marketing team needs a new strategy to get customers to buy their products and this can be super disheartening if you care for that type of stuff.
customer_reviews.author: Stefanie

customer_reviews.title: Five Stars
customer_reviews.text: Looks is deceiving! But well descripted, So 5 starred it!
customer_reviews.author: moish

customer_reviews.title: Nice but...
customer_reviews.text: Very good material, and nice look. The inside division and closing mode are really umconfortable
customer_reviews.author: Ezequiel

customer_reviews.title: One Star
customer_reviews.text: I don't recommend this set of luggage. It will get destroyed by the baggage handler equipment.
customer_reviews.author: Debra Duckett

customer_reviews.title: Very happy.
customer_reviews.text: Arrived the next day! Good quality and look very nice. Very happy with purchase.
customer_reviews.author: Amazon Customer

customer_reviews.title: Cheapest version of Samsonite-Think Old Navy quality
customer_reviews.text: These are not your typical Samsonite pieces of luggage. They are a cheaper version. Think of a factory store version (old navy versus Banana Republic). We opened the box and immediately knew they were not the same as other piece of Samsonite we had purchased. I could go into all the differences, but just know within minutes we had them boxed up again to send back. Save your money and don't be fooled.
customer_reviews.author: Jeremy

customer_reviews.title: Contains products that may lead to cancer!
customer_reviews.text: Why the 3 stars? Everything is great. Does kind of get scratched up but the biggest problem I had is the lack of information provided by Amazon. This product is made of materials that can lead to cancer ie the chemical that is not allowed for sale in California. If you have no problem with that, this is great find for the price ($125 for the set)
customer_reviews.author: Buyer O1

customer_reviews.title: One Star
customer_reviews.text: i get the suitcase. the suitcase is locked and i can't find the keys and codes.
customer_reviews.author: Amazon Customer

product_meta.title: Samsonite Duraflex Lightweight Hardside Set (20"/28"), Only at Amazon, Charcoal
product_meta.description: ABS Exclusive to Amazon Carry-On Spinner measures 20" x 14.2" x 9.8" (excluding handle and wheels) and weighs 7.35lbs Larger Spinner measures 24" x 16.5" x 11" (excluding handle and wheels) and weighs 9.79 lbs Intense corrugation for shell strength, newest ripple texture for scratch resistance, ABS/Polycarbonate Blend Cases expand for maximum capacity, clean modern panel design Ergonomic pull-handle system, Full divider and compression straps TSA lock on larger checked piece only Shipping Note: Shipping to Alaska, Hawaii, P.O. Boxes, and APO addresses is not available for this item
feature_bullets: Carry-On Spinner measures 20" x 14.2" x 9.8" (excluding handle and wheels) and weighs 7.35lbs
Larger Spinner measures 28" x 19.1" x 12.6" (excluding handle and wheels) and weighs 11.46 lbs
Intense corrugation for shell strength, newest ripple texture for scratch resistance, ABS/Polycarbonate Blend
Cases expand for maximum capacity, clean modern panel design
Ergonomic pull-handle system, Full divider and compression straps
TSA lock on larger checked piece only
